content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to live data. However, there are multiple rental car companies operating in Massa and the surrounding area. Some of the major car rental companies operating in this region include Hertz, Avis, Sixt, Europcar, and Budget. They offer a wide range of vehicles such as economy cars, luxury cars, SUVs and vans that customers can rent for a daily or weekly basis. The availability of rental cars may vary depending on the season, so it is recommended to book in advance to ensure availability. It is possible to search for available rental cars and reserve online or directly contact the rental car companies.
